(UNITURN mérőállomás doboz fedlap)
(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1 h19
t2 m d2 h19
t3 m d3 h19
yxz
t1
s50
f200

mx = 179.5
my = 25
ma = 12

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

hx = 167.25
hy = 27.55

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1  z3.2 c0.03 g1,0.1,0.7 jg0.4
h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1  z3.2 c0.03 g1,0.1,0.7 jg0.4
h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1  z3.2 c0.03 g1,0.1,0.7 jg0.4
h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03

hy = add($hy,$ma)

h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1  z3.2 c0.03 g1,0.1,0.7 jg0.4
h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03

my = add($my,$ma)

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1  z3.2 c0.03 g1,0.1,0.7 jg0.4
h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03

hx = add($hx,15)
hy = add($hy,11)

h $hx,$hy d3 z3.2 c0.03
